item.title: Vengeance
item.description:
@26593 wrote:

what you mean [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 03:35:09 AM[/size][hr]how can i create a script that starts when i get hit??? =\ i know im annoying with all the questions… but i really need it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 04:15:50 AM[/size][hr]i have a better script stole it from ricscape… but i got one error i put it in next post…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 04:16:54 AM[/size][hr]this is the error:

client.java:20172: cannot find symbol symbol : method castVengeance() location: class client castVengeance(); ^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 04:18:29 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help me??

item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(Ihitsomeonewithveng)
{
hitDiff = person.hitDiff / 2;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
}

item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

Search for

				                            case 170: // laugh emote

then add this under it

{ if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 100; stillgfx(401, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 5); setAnimation(1914); stillgfx(465, absX, absY); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } }

and remove the startAnimation(0x35D);
leave the break;

Read full topic
